message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be far beyond $8000. However, I am willing to extend a special introductory offer to you at a price of $12000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this remarkable product at a premium value, ensuring you receive unparalleled benefits. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
